metadata.title: CVE-2017-0374 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: lib/Config/Model.pm in Config-Model (aka libconfig-model-perl) before 2.102 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted model in the current working directory, related to use of . with the INC array.

criterions.comment: libconfig-model-perl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.097-2').
